text: This campaign is raising funds and awareness towards animal abuse.
This campaign is raising funds and awareness towards the effects of climate change on the planet.
Every person should be able to eat at least three times a day. Help us erradicate hunger now!
Education can change a child's future. We are raising funds to bring education to every world corner.
What mental health needs is more sunlight, more candor, and more unashamed conversation. Help us now!
No one should be discriminated because of their gender, or have less opportunities than others.
This campaign is raising funds and awareness to help reduce the impact of Covid around the globe.
